price: Is it that we mistakenly made fun of them, or do our eyes fail to see them [in the Fire]?”
arabic: أَتَّخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا أَمۡ زَاغَتۡ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ
